about_the_game:
People overwhelmed with fear in a cursed place ask you, a psychic, for exorcism.
A cursed space. And from there, the cursed canvas coming towards you...
This canvas captures the fear that lies deep within your heart...



Cursed Canvas is a single-player horror game. Players explore various cursed locations to perform exorcism rituals.
In places full of darkness, only a flashlight can help you see. Flashlight batteries deplete over time, and if the batteries run out, your exorcism will be a failure.



As you try to find haunted objects in a cursed place to lift the curse, the cursed canvas approaches you at every moment...



If the Cursed Canvas finds you, you will have to face the canvas containing the horrors of the abyss. And the cursed canvas will eat away at your fear-ridden mind. However, as a competent psychic, you can see the weak points of the Cursed Canvas and spray holy water on them to push them away.



Find and destroy the haunted object before your soul is consumed by the cursed canvas! That is the only way to salvation...

content_descriptors.notes: The Cursed Canvas will show you some scary scenes with jump scare. Elderly or pregnant women should use with caution.
